title: Looking for serious team Dynamic/OOL Plat ATM
body:
Looking for a serious team to play with, rank up or try for OOL.
Currently Platinum V will be climbing to diamond by this month. ( i will try )
Has to be gold 2 plus team.
Currently ADC MAIN can play other roles decently as well. i can play all adc champions my pool is pretty big will pick depending on the teams comp. Add me - Sultan
